name: Assassin
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Assassin has not used their ability: The Assassin either shows a 'no' head shake or points to a player. That player dies.

otherNights.description: Once per game at night*, choose a player: they die, even if they could not.
